sentences.en: An untidy lad let him in and took him into a drawing - room.
sentences.cn: 一位衣冠不整的小伙子出来招呼他进去,领他进了一间客厅.

sentences.en: Clothes were thrown in the luggage in an untidy heap.
sentences.cn: 衣服被乱糟糟地扔进旅行箱里。

sentences.en: Her clothes were in an untidy heap on the floor.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服胡乱堆在地板上。

sentences.en: Her dark hair waved untidy across her broad forehead.
sentences.cn: 她的黑发散乱地飘拂在宽阔的脑门子上.

sentences.en: Her wiry hair was pushed up on top of her head in an untidy bun.
sentences.cn: 她粗硬的头发向上梳起，在头顶乱糟糟地盘成了个发髻。

sentences.en: His hair and beard are both untidy and his skin is quite leathery.
sentences.cn: 他须发蓬乱，皮肤也相当粗糙。

sentences.en: His uniform was crumpled, untidy, splashed with mud.
sentences.cn: 他的制服皱巴巴的，邋遢不堪，还溅上了泥点。

sentences.en: I must apologize for the untidy state of the room.
sentences.cn: 屋子这么不整洁,实在抱歉.

sentences.en: I'm afraid tidiness is not his strong point , ie he is untidy.
sentences.cn: 我看他这个人不大讲究整洁.

sentences.en: My untidy brother drops all his clothes on the floor.
sentences.cn: 我那位不讲整洁的弟弟把衣服全扔在地上.

sentences.en: She cannot bear an untidy desk. Everything must be just so.
sentences.cn: 她就怕书桌上凌乱. 样样东西都必须井然有序.

sentences.en: She tried to look picturesque, but only succeeded in being untidy.
sentences.cn: 她想使自己显得美艳入画, 结果却叫人感到她衣冠不整.

sentences.en: The end of the Thirty Years War was an untidy affair.
sentences.cn: 三十年战争的结局并不干脆利落.
这地方很快变得凌乱不堪。

sentences.en: Why do you have to be so untidy?
sentences.cn: 你为什么非得这么邋遢？

sentences.en: Your beautiful handwriting puts my untidy scrawl to shame.
sentences.cn: 你漂亮的字体把我的潦草字迹比得见不得人.

words.tran_cn: 不整洁，不修边幅；凌乱，无条理性

trans.tran_cn: 不整洁的，凌乱的，懒散的，不干净利落的，不简练的，不适宜的
